full_summary:
***
# Stage 1 - Bethune Memorial House Envelope Restoration Project

## Project Overview

Parks Canada is seeking the services of a contractor to restore the building envelope of the Bethune Memorial House at 235 John Street, Gravenhurst, ON.

## Project Objective

The primary objective of this project is to restore the building envelope of the Bethune Memorial House, a National Historic Site of Canada, with the utmost care to preserve the cultural defining elements.

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0291/A
* **Publication Date**: January 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 7, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Annik Piché
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Email: [annik.piche@pc.gc.ca](mailto:annik.piche@pc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (581) 398-3489
	+ Fax: (855) 983-1808

## Tender Description

The successful bidder will be required to submit a two-stage bid, with the first stage evaluating the qualifications of all interested suppliers and the second stage inviting qualified suppliers to provide further qualifications and a financial bid.

## Documents and Attachments

All documents related to this solicitation can be found on the Government of Canada's electronic tendering service at [canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
